entry.tran: 半真半假的陈述;真伪混同的欺骗性陈述
entry.def: If you describe statements as half-truths, you mean that they are only partly based on fact and are intended or likely to deceive people.

example.ex: The article had been full of errors and half truths.
example.tran: 这篇文章里尽是些错误和真假参半的内容。
